DF_FLAG_EDIT.Title: Flag Editor - {0} ({1})
DF_FLAG_EDIT.EditButtonPromptDesc:
You can enter an Object's ID (jQFzSIMgxCXFvCyr)
or an Object's Path (game.scenes.viewed)
If you use an Object Path, the path must be an avaluatable JavaScript expression that results in an ID, a Document, or a Data object.
DF_FLAG_EDIT.DeletionNotice: NOTICE: The root keys cannot be removed once added. Only their contents can be truly deleted. This is a flaw in the FoundryVTT Flag system.
